channel.title: Is there any to port certain BM models to another game?
channel.description:
What I'm saying is, there is a light model that I love (light_sleek02, I think it's called), and I want to use it for a CSS map. Problem is, attempting to port and use it results in this "cannot find vertex" error, and this causes the map to not be updated.
Is there a way around this issue?

item.title: Is there any to port certain BM models to another game?
item.dc:creator: Moran
item.description:
Crypt19:

Hm… I’ll go try it with the model you need, in the meantime, you test the model in a separate map, if you haven’t already.

Edit:
It’s working fine for me

Verify that you have all the files and that it’s not just the map.

Files I’ve copied over:

"cstrike\materials\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02_off.vmt"
"cstrike\materials\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02_off.vtf"
"cstrike\materials\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02_on.vmt"
"cstrike\materials\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02_on.vtf"

"cstrike\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02.dx80.vtx"
"cstrike\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02.dx90.vtx"
"cstrike\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02.mdl"
"cstrike\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02.phy"
"cstrike\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02.sw.vtx"
"cstrike\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02.vvd"

Okay, now it seems to work. Maybe the mistake I made was copying the whole BMS models folder and not just the ones with the prop_ prefix.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there any to port certain BM models to another game?

item.title: Is there any to port certain BM models to another game?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Hm… I’ll go try it with the model you need, in the meantime, you test the model in a separate map, if you haven’t already.

Edit:
It’s working fine for me

1280×720 98.7 KB

Verify that you have all the files and that it’s not just the map.

Files I’ve copied over:

"cstrike\materials\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02_off.vmt"
"cstrike\materials\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02_off.vtf"
"cstrike\materials\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02_on.vmt"
"cstrike\materials\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02_on.vtf"

"cstrike\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02.dx80.vtx"
"cstrike\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02.dx90.vtx"
"cstrike\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02.mdl"
"cstrike\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02.phy"
"cstrike\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02.sw.vtx"
"cstrike\models\props_blackmesa\light_sleek02.vvd"

item.title: Is there any to port certain BM models to another game?
item.dc:creator: Moran
item.description:
Crypt19:

You copied all of the models files over? Not just the .mdl, but the .vtx, .vvd, etc.

I have, good sir.

In fact, I copied the models and materials folders over (for texture purposes).

Read full topic

item.source: Is there any to port certain BM models to another game?

item.title: Is there any to port certain BM models to another game?
item.dc:creator: Moran
item.description:
Crypt19:

You should just be able to copy the model files and it’s textures over to your CSS folder to use. You sure it’s the model causing the vertex error?

I am not sure. I did what you did, but the issue seems to stand.

I have a feeling that the model files all point to the file being located in the BMS folder and not the one in the CSS folder.

Read full topic
